Portfolio

About

Hello! My name is Eleano Barone, I'm majoring in Software Engineering and Economics at Allegheny College. I’m fascinated on how code can shape the future and make everyday tasks easier. This is exactly what I want to do, and I’m excited to dive deeper into both fields.

Being fluent in Italian and English also helps me see things from different perspectives, and I’m always looking forward to learning from and working with others who share my passion. I’m confident that this path is where I’m meant to be, and I can’t wait to take on challenges along the way!

Swim Instructor

Expierence

During the summers I am a Red Cross Certified Swimming Instructor. I successfully teach children ages 3-15 how to swim, and teach them about water safety.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Swim Teacher

Food Management

Expierence

I am currently a Manager at my family’s resturaunt, Pizza Town. My tasks are to ensure employees, and customers are happy. On the job, you can catch me filling in whenever a cook needs a break, helping with payroll, checking inventory, and ordering inventory. I also help run our social media pages.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Food Managment

Expierence

During the Summer I am a Lifeguard and work at the local community pool to give back to the community that has served me. —
